name: guardian-wallet-system
description: Guardian Wallet System - Digital wallet for college environments

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../admin-panel && npm install && cd ../mobile-app && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,admin -c blue,green "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix admin-panel"
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset --force && node seed_mock.js
